long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Master foreign languages with eLang, the smart language learning companion. Immerse in the world of your favorite Netflix shows, movies, YouTube videos, and Coursera courses and combine the fun with the rewarding. Say goodbye to tab switching and other inconveniences and focus on your watching.

ğŸŒŸ SMART SUBTITLES: Enjoy YouTube, Netflix, and Coursera content subtitled in two languages simultaneously, making it easier to understand and learn.

ğŸŒŸ FAST TRANSLATION: Make sense of what's happening on screen with instant translation of text and subtitles.

ğŸŒŸ ALL ABOUT WORDS: Synonyms, pronunciation and other useful information at your disposal.

ğŸŒŸ IMPROVED VIDEO NAVIGATION: Repeat phrases, slow down playback, and search for specific subtitles to improve your results.

ğŸŒŸ SUBTITLES LIST: Get a timestamped list of subtitles for easy navigation and search.

ğŸŒŸ BUILD YOUR DICTIONARY: Add words to your personal dictionary with translation and context of use.

ğŸŒŸ PLAY & TRAIN: Practice and consolidate your vocabulary in an interactive and fun way.

ğŸŒŸ WIDE TRANSLATION SUPPORT: Take advantage of translation support for 102 languages, making eLang accessible to learners around the world.

ğŸŒŸ DOWNLOAD SUBTITLES FROM YOUTUBE, NETFLIX, AND COURSERA: Save important information, revise it and learn.

ğŸŒŸ SPEECH-TO-TEXT: Use auto-generated subtitles in English for any video or during online calls/meetings.

ğŸŒŸ QUICK ACCESS TO FAMOUS DICTIONARIES: Look up desired words in third-party dictionaries with ease.

eLang is the perfect tool to improve your foreign language skills with movies, videos, news, etc. Save money on tutors, learn from native speakers anywhere and choose engaging content. Learning a foreign language with Netflix, YouTube and Coursera is now available to everyone - try it today!

You can also practice your translated words with our mobile app. It's available for free on iOS and Android:

ğŸ“± App Store - https://apps.apple.com/by/app/elang-words-train-vocabulary/id1622786750
ğŸ“± Play Market - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.englishingames.easy5


Add the eLang extension and start using it for free!

*** From the eLang team ***
https://elang.app/games
And if you're learning English, get the most out of it with our mobile games! We offer apps on different aspects of English, including irregular verbs, phrasal verbs, prepositions and more. Play, improve your understanding and increase your English proficiency!

https://elang.app/elangtv
eLang-TV is an online service for learning English with your favorite videos on your cell phone. Translate unfamiliar words and phrases on the go!

Imparate le lingue straniere con eLang, il compagno di apprendimento intelligente. Immergetevi nel mondo dei vostri spettacoli e film preferiti di Netflix, dei video di YouTube e dei corsi di Coursera e unite il divertimento alla gratificazione. ğŸŒŸ GIOCA E ALLENATI: esercita e consolida il tuo vocabolario in modo interattivo e divertente.

ğŸŒŸ AMPIO SUPPORTO DI TRADUZIONE: Approfittate del supporto di traduzione per 102 lingue, rendendo eLang accessibile agli studenti di tutto il mondo.

ğŸŒŸ ACCESSO VELOCE AI DIZIONARI RICONOSCIUTI: Cerca facilmente le parole desiderate nei dizionari di terze parti.
